description: Mypy is a program that will type check your Python code.

-h.description: Show this help message and exit

-V.description: Show program's version number and exit

--config-file.description: Configuration file... (defaults to mypy.ini, .mypy.ini, pyproject.toml, setup.cfg)

--warn-unused-configs.description: Warn about unused '[mypy-<pattern>]' or '[[tool.mypy.overrides]]' config sections

--ignore-missing-imports.description: Silently ignore imports of missing modules

--follow-untyped-imports.description: Typecheck modules without stubs or py.typed marker

--python-executable.description: Python executable used for finding PEP 561 compliant installed packages and stubs

--no-site-packages.description: Do not search for installed PEP 561 compliant packages

--no-silence-site-packages.description: Do not silence errors in PEP 561 compliant installed packages

--python-version.description: Type check code assuming it will be running on Python x.y

--platform.description: Type check special-cased code for the given OS platform (defaults to sys.platform)

--always-true.description: Additional variable to be considered True (may be repeated)

--always-false.description: Additional variable to be considered False (may be repeated)

--disallow-any-expr.description: Disallow all expressions that have type Any

--disallow-any-decorated.description: Disallow functions that have Any in their signature after decorator transformation

--disallow-any-explicit.description: Disallow explicit Any in type positions

--disallow-any-generics.description: Disallow usage of generic types that do not specify explicit type parameters

--disallow-any-unimported.description: Disallow Any types resulting from unfollowed imports

--disallow-subclassing-any.description: Disallow subclassing values of type 'Any' when defining classes

--disallow-untyped-calls.description: Disallow calling functions without type annotations from functions with type annotations

--untyped-calls-exclude.description: Disable --disallow-untyped-calls for functions/methods from specific module/package/class

--disallow-untyped-defs.description: Disallow defining functions without type annotations or with incomplete type annotations

--disallow-incomplete-defs.description: Disallow defining functions with incomplete type annotations

--check-untyped-defs.description: Type check the interior of functions without type annotations

--disallow-untyped-decorators.description: Disallow decorating typed functions with untyped decorators

--implicit-optional.description: Assume arguments with default values of None are Optional

--warn-redundant-casts.description: Warn about casting an expression to its inferred type

--warn-unused-ignores.description: Warn about unneeded '# type: ignore' comments

--no-warn-no-return.description: Do not warn about functions that end without returning

--warn-return-any.description: Warn about returning values of type Any from non-Any typed functions

--warn-unreachable.description: Warn about statements or expressions inferred to be unreachable

--report-deprecated-as-note.description: Report importing or using deprecated features as notes instead of errors

--allow-untyped-globals.description: Suppress toplevel errors caused by missing annotations

--allow-redefinition.description: Allow unconditional variable redefinition with a new type

--no-implicit-reexport.description: Treat imports as private unless aliased

--strict-equality.description: Prohibit equality, identity, and container checks for non-overlapping types

--strict-bytes.description: Disable treating bytearray and memoryview as subtypes of bytes

--extra-checks.description: Enable additional checks that are technically correct but may be impractical...

--strict.description: Strict mode; enables many other strictness flags.

--show-error-context.description: Precede errors with "note:" messages explaining context

--show-column-numbers.description: Show column numbers in error messages

--show-error-end.description: Show end line/end column numbers in error messages...

--hide-error-codes.description: Hide error codes in error messages

--show-error-code-links.description: Show links to error code documentation

--pretty.description: Use visually nicer output in error messages...

--no-error-summary.description: Do not show error stats summary

--cache-dir.description: Store module cache info in the given folder... (defaults to '.mypy_cache')

--sqlite-cache.description: Use a sqlite database to store the cache

--cache-fine-grained.description: Include fine-grained dependency information in the cache for the mypy daemon

--skip-version-check.description: Allow using cache written by older mypy version

--skip-cache-mtime-checks.description: Skip cache internal consistency checks based on mtime

--old-type-inference.description: Disable new experimental type inference algorithm

--custom-typeshed-dir.description: Use the custom typeshed in DIR

--warn-incomplete-stub.description: Warn if missing type annotation in typeshed...

--shadow-file.description: When encountering SOURCE_FILE, read and type check the contents of SHADOW_FILE instead.

-m.description: Type-check module; can repeat for more modules.

-p.description: Type-check package recursively; can be repeated.

-c.description: Type-check program passed in as string.

files.name: files
files.description: Files or directories to type check.
